plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am the color of many trees.
🌱 You can find me in a field.
🐄 Some animals eat me to get energy.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and pretty colors. Bees love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌺 I smell very nice.
🌷 I grow from a seed.
🐝 You might give me as a gift.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and I am red, green, or yellow. You can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a healthy snack.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.
🌳 I need a tree to grow.

plant.question: I am tall and have many branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I lose my leaves in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🪵 You can build things from me.

plant.question: I am long and orange and rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.
🐰 Bugs Bunny likes me a lot.

plant.question: I have sharp needles and stay green all year long. You decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 I smell like the forest.
⭐ I can be decorated with ornaments.
🎁 Presents go under me.

plant.question: I grow on a vine, and I'm green, red, or purple. You can make juice out of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 Grown-ups sometimes drink me after I'm squished.
🧺 You pick me in the fall.

plant.question: I am big and round, and I'm orange on the outside and inside. People carve faces into me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am a popular decoration in October.
🥧 You can make a pie from me.
🌱 I grow in a patch.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem, and I have beautiful flowers. Be careful, because I have thorns! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a gift for love.
🥀 My thorns can poke you.
💐 I come in many different colors like red, pink and white.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree! What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green.
🌳 I look like a tiny tree.
💪 I am good for you.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people. I go on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I am often red, blue, or white.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families ride in me.
🛣️ I need a road to move.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
💺 People sit inside me.
✈️ I have wings but I'm not a bird.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can carry many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a loud choo-choo sound.
🛤️ I follow a special path made of metal.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride on me together

transport.question: I float on water and take people across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a duck.
⚓ I need water to move.
🚢 I can be very big.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 I need you to push the pedals.
🔔 I have a bell you can ring.
⚠️ You can fall off if you don't balance!

transport.question: I am big and red, and I help put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a loud siren.
💧 I spray water.
👨‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.

transport.question: I take kids to school every day. I am yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.
🧒 Children ride in me.
🏫 I go to the same place every morning.

transport.question: I travel in space, far away from Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I go very fast.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I travel to other planets.

transport.question: I zoom through the city collecting people and dropping them off. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I have a meter that counts how much you owe.
📍 You can call me to a certain location.
🚖 I am usually yellow, but can be other colors.

transport.question: I help sick people get to the hospital quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a siren and flashing lights.
🩺 Paramedics work in me.
🏥 I bring people to the hospital
